short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ensures desktop browsers go to the correct Spotify results page from the DoubleJ playlist page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Australian digital radio station, Double J, has a playlist page with links to Spotify. The Spotify (search) sometimes breaks if either party changes URL structure, so this extension redirects to a working search page.
